resources.string: D: Cannot Write To Tag. (Tip: Hold up to tag and press ADD MSG)
Tap to read tag. Tap \"ADD MSG\" to post.
Tag is writable. Emoticons is encouraged :D
Note: Tag is locked. Read only.
How To Create A New MsgBrd Tag

"Minimum Requirement: 1kb (e.g. NTAG216). If stuck outdoor, you need a Waterproof/Epoxy NFC tag. Normal cheap paper tags dies outside, due to moisture and rain. 

 Steps: 
 1. Use 'Dangerous NFC' app from 'Dangerous Things' to guard against writelocking (Please use 1234 as your password). 
 2. Write a text record to an unlocked NFC tag. (For your convenience, in the menu you can click on "Enable New Tag Creation Mode"). 

 Now your tag is ready to use as a messageboard!!"
"This is an app to allow for offline messaging via a single writable NFC tag. Written By Brian Khuu . Licenced as GNU General Public License v3.0+ . https://github.com/mofosyne/NFCMessageBoard "
